acf.banner_bottom_content_mobile:
Our motivation is to improve Utah Homeowners' home-building experience by delivering high-quality Structural & Civil Engineering Plans for permit approval smoothly.
We have a 100% success rate<sup>(1)</sup> in obtaining Residential & Commercial Building Permits.

We’re experienced, reliable, and budget-friendly.
acf.banner_content:
Our Experienced Structural & Civil Engineers for your Residential & Commercial Project Needs

At ProStruct Engineering we take pride in professionalism. Our motivation is to improve Utah Homeowners' home-building experience by delivering high-quality Structural & Civil Engineering Plans for permit approval smoothly. We have a 100% success rate(1) in obtaining Residential & Commercial Building Permits. We’re experienced, reliable, and budget-friendly.
acf.banner_content_mobile: Our Experienced Utah Structural & Civil Engineers for your Residential & Commercial Project Needs
acf.copyright_text: © 2024 ProStruct Engineering Inc. All Rights Reserved.
acf.footer_bottom_content: (1)This only applies to our scope of work and omits unsuccessful permitting due to external factors like land ownership disputes, existing illegal Construction, flawed Architectural/Design plans, issues with client-provided documents, or the client halting the project for any reason, etc.
acf.footer_site_description: Our structural engineers offer dependable professional structural engineering services for residential building permits at reasonable prices. Trust us to deliver high-quality structural plans.

reasons.heading: Experienced

reasons.description:

reasons.heading: Professionalism

acf.section_content_about_us: ProStruct Engineering’s experienced team of Professional Structural & Civil Engineers provides high-quality engineering plans that comply with building permit requirements for residential & Commercial projects. Our goal is to offer budget-friendly services and act as a dependable ally throughout the process. Our services include Structural Site Inspections, Structural Calculations, creating Structural Plans, and preparing Structural Permit Sets, and Civil Engineering Plans.
acf.section_content_about_us_mobile: Our services include Structural Site Inspections, Structural Calculations, creating Structural Plans, and preparing Structural Permit Sets and Civil Engineering Plans. Our goal is to offer budget-friendly services and acting as a dependable ally throughout the process.
acf.section_content_pt:
Project Types

Our Structural & Civil Engineers’ expertise in providing Engineering Services extends to a variety of Residential & Commercial Project Types, including:
  • New Custom Home
  • ADU
  • Home Addition/Remodel
  • Load Bearing Wall Removal
  • Commercial Projects
  • Retaining Wall
  • Deck, Patio & Porch
  • Foundation Design & More
  • Construction Administration
  • Civil Engineering
GET YOUR FREE QUOTE
